name: The Magic Letter Seal
description:
This game was made in 3 hours for the 73rd Trijam.

The fairies need their mail, as all people do. But they are so small, that it's almost impossible to get their mail to them.

Thankfully you work at the post office.

You are a magical seal with the capability to change your size.

Your job is to deliver all the fairy mail.

If you expierence many visual glitches in the Web Version, try a download version.

Source Code: https://github.com/TLochow/The-Magic-Letter-Seal
